snippet.title: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement - WIP Gameplay
snippet.description:
A gameplay video of my upcoming level pack for Abysm 2: Infernal Contract, Pharaoh's Judgement. This can be loaded in along side the base mod for an additional Episode.

This mod is still Work in Progress and is subject to change.

Abysm is inspired by Action Adventure/RPGs such as Diablo 2, Dark Souls and Heretic, while keeping the Doom gameplay as its core.
